title: pera vENumE aruL
sahitya:
pera vENumE aruL unadai murugA ini enrum nAn


anupallavi

  marudamalai mEl mahimai mighunda varadanAga sirandiDum ayyanE


caraNam    sharaNamenr-unadu sannidhi sEra nAn varuvEn vandunnai vandanai purivEn 
taruNamadil nI karuNaiyuDan ennai aravaNaittu aLikkum tuNaiyAl
